Board.name: algebra_by
Board.author: Bruno Coudoin (bruno.coudoin@gcompris.net)
Board.title: Practice the multiplication operation
Board.goal: In a limited time, give the product of two numbers
Board.manual: A multiplication of two numbers is displayed. At the right of the equals sign, give the answer, the product. Use the left and right arrows to modify your answer and press the Enter key to check if you've got it right. If not, just try again.
